message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my offer reflects the true value of this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $900,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
